definitions.definition: Either rear half of a side of beef , mutton, veal, lamb or by extension from another edible mammal.
The hind biped (leg) of a quadruped , or all body parts situated behind the hind legs' trunk -attachment.

definitions.label_groups: metonymic , derogatory , usually in the plural

main_definition: Either rear half of a side of beef , mutton, veal, lamb or by extension from another edible mammal.
secondary_definitions: ( in the plural ) The hind biped (leg) of a quadruped , or all body parts situated behind the hind legs' trunk -attachment.
( metonymic , derogatory , usually in the plural ) Human behind , butt .
